items.summary: Ensure the Internet Identity principal "ekphf-6psww-nfwx5-qaowa-goqyc-hgqqa-4m57p-3xfjb-kb73d-joktd-sqe" is granted the admin role (multi-admin) so they can access all admin-only routes and APIs.

Implement a safe, conditional upgrade path so existing deployed canister state gains the admin role for "ekphf-6psww-nfwx5-qaowa-goqyc-hgqqa-4m57p-3xfjb-kb73d-joktd-sqe" without losing existing data (products, updates, contacts, profiles, logo) and without breaking current admins.
